divs: sighting detailsi was driving on 69 hwy toward excelsior springs, the sighting took place approximately 2-3 minutes before reaching stoplight by walmart, near wooded area with large grassy\wooded median. saw what i first thought was a non-disintegrating piece of a firework, then realized it wasn't going away and was hovering. it was an orange glowing ball that continued to hover not far from my car as i drove. i watched it as it hovered for a minute, then slowly move toward my left, hover for another minute, then slowly ascent. within approximately 15 seconds it went from being relatively close to my car to looking like a star in the sky, then disappeared completely.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Orange glowing ball hovers then ascents
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Excelsior Springs
There were no other sightings in Excelsior Springs on or around July 3rd 2012
